website_summaries.verdict: This option stands out for its quiet operation and unique accessories bundle.
pros: Easy to set up and use
Ships with accessories that include a cleaning brush, storage bag, and access to a downloadable recipe guide
cons: The instructions for using this option can be confusing
Some complaints that this infuser is not as long-lasting as other models

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with battery installation.
customer_reviews.text: Edit. I wrote a 1 star review because of the incorrect battery instructions. After requesting a return,the company sent me a replacement and a refund for the hassle. The new device works well. Be careful when installing the batteries though and ignore the instructions. Negative sides touch all 4 of the springs as you would expect. The instructions caused confusion. The customer service was great though and overall I'm happy. Original review. If you install the batterys the way the instructions show, it shorts them out and causes the contacts to overheat. This device is dangerous. I will be returning mine after burning my hand on the battery cover with the device off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Priced great; super easy to use; smokes like a pro; compact and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Just got my awesome little smoker! It was super easy to use...just popped 4 AA batteries in...added a little scoop of applewood shavings...lit it, and wow! The cold smoke immediately poured out of the tube as I filled the dome of a glass bowl, covering 4 nice tenderloins. I let them sit for 1/2 hour before grilling, and enjoyed a great smoked flavor, with this handy tool. I would take this camping, over to friends...any time I want that smoked goodness. Its a snap, with its own black bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useful little thing
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this little smoker for smoking whiskey and making a smoked Old Fashioned. I ended up trying it out on some meats and really fell in love with it. I got some mesquite wood chips, put some raw steaks in a container and pumped in some smoke and let it sit for 20 minutes so it would absorb into the fibers of the meat before seasoning. I cooked it in the oven but it tasted like it was grilled over an open fire.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Might melt on you the first time.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: An update. Gramercy is sending me a new replacement unit. Their customer care was friendly, helpful and quick to take my concerns seriously. They also did not make me jump through any hoops to receive assistance. I'm going to try using wood fuel that's more like the consistency of pet cage wood chips as per the advice of the customer service representative. Further update will come once I receive the unit. Old Review: It might be a one off, but the first time I used it the device overheated. All I was doing was smoking cheddar cheese for about a minute. Judging from the burnt plastic smell, the fan inside must have melted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You have to use a big lighter to light the chips, but it stays LIT as long as the fan is on.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little smoke gun so far. I'm amazed by the amount of smoke it generates. It's very simple to operate. I wished they would put a cleaning brush in with this unit. I purchased a small stiff bristle paint brush to clean it with.
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional smoker!
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional product! I’ve never used a device like this, and after researching and reading others’ reviews, I went with this Gramercy product. I’m so happy I did! It takes just a few small chips to get a lot of smoke! Usually 10 seconds or so is all I need. The smoker is very well built, and while I thought the bag it comes with was gimmicky, it’s actually a really nice touch. I can unbag the smoker, pack it with wood, light it, and smoke what I need in under a minute. It takes about a minute to cool down and then back it goes in the bag. I’d definitely recommend this smoker!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Having seen these used on cooking shows I figured I would risk my $20. It was a waste of money - it did not add flavor to my food and made my house smell like a forest fire. I tried it on different foods with different textures and none really tasted from smoke. I had to use it under my stove hood on full blast and my house was still smokey. Additionally, the sawdust is ridiculously expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: It can’t be compared to commercial grade but does it’s job well
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t come with any wood chips. But easy to use. The rubber tubing spoils the flavor. The first time I used the smell of burnt rubber on meat. I had to trash the meat. Next I removed the rubber tubing and burnt the wood chips. It was ok. For the money I wouldn’t complain. If it was electric it would have been great. It’s takes 4 AAA-batteries. Cannot use it for long cuz the heat might melt the plastic inside maybe thats why it was designed to work with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't help my drinking problem - but it's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Well I received the first one DOA - but immediately emailed the company and was dispatched a new one. It showed up in two days and I was able to start smoking my bourbon. Highly recommend for the price and awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I was able to amaze our family & friends with a smoked salmon at ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to amaze our family & friends with a smoked salmon at our Easter family dinner. Can't wait to use it again on another fine dinner. Several friends asked them to send me the link to Amazon for the smoker. I highly recommend this product. Absolutely love my new smoker. It shipped very quickly and after it shipped the seller kept us in the loop for the Tracking number and when we would expect it to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Such a unique product! A solid and sturdy item that goes with a lot of stainless steel items within the kitchen! I would recommend wood chips or sawdust as trying to light pellets can be a little harder. Fun to have the ability to take a portable mini smoker to enhance foods if we were to travel and wanted that smokey flavor in our vacation food.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable unit !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Gramercy Kitchen Co. unit is very nice!!!! It is also made of quality construction; a very solid unit. It delivers an excellent supply of smoke for any smoking instance. I really like the portable feature as there is a neat little carry case, so I can bring this with me to dinner parties to experiment with cocktail recipes! Awesome little unit !!!! Will be buying one for my parents anniversary bag this summer.
customer_reviews.author: RAD Man

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: It all sounds wonderful and I was excited to try it out on my brother, who is a foodie, when they visited us this week. Well, it worked well initially but when I went to smoke my next batch of salmon the device had frozen and the fan would not turn. I would have rated this lower but I still had to provide one star. I will be returning this to the company for a refund. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Alexa Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker! I've bought two, one for me and one as a gift. I've used it for drinks and food and everybody loves it. It is a cool novelty to have and something to add additional flavors and aromas to your cocktails and food. I love using it when i have friends over. I use a bourbon soaked oak as the wood flavoring but have heard other woods are amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Greenwald

customer_reviews.title: Worked great the first time I used it, then it never worked again
customer_reviews.text: I used it the first time a few weeks ago and it was amazing. I cleaned it and put it away and then tried it tonight and it didn't work. Changed the batteries and looked for troubleshooting tips and see nothing. Terribly disappointed. We are having a party tomorrow and i was telling everyone about the great smoked bourbon drinks that i was going to make. I guess that isn't going to happen now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Smokes like Snoop dogg!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this thing. It is weighty and makes a ton of smoke from a pinch of wood. The flexible hose makes contorting and entry into a tented dish easy. Turn an exhaust fan on 'cause this will excite your smoke detector!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after a month or two!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product so much. I wanted to like it every time the company had to replace it because the TWO I had just so happened to be malfunctioning. When the smoker works, it’s great. However, know that I had three of these and they work for about 1-2 months before becoming completely unusable. Save your time and money and just get a better one. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: APeditto

customer_reviews.title: It won’t always work but it’s great when it does.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great but it’s is very unpredictable if it will work. It worked the first 3-4 times no problem. The connections to the battery are awful and now it won’t come on at all even w new batteries. Then it will randomly turn on 45 minutes later. If they could get a product that consistently had power it would be 5 starts. Not knowing if it will work when needed is a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw a friend of mine using one of these, was very intrigued, and eventually decided to get one for myself. It is so simple and so much fun to use! It 'fancifies' cheeses, meats, cocktails, etc. But beyond loving the product, I had a reason to reach out to their customer service and they went above and beyond my expectations! It's a rarity these days to find a company as customer focused as Gramercy Kitchen. I highly recommend them and their product!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The smoker is awesome! We've used it to create smoked Old Fashions with mesquite wood chips, and they were delicious!!! I also used it enhance the flavor of a baked salmon meal I recently made, and again... so easy and tasty! It was the perfect finish to every bite. I'm excited to find even more ways to use the smoker to enhance our meals.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of Two CutiePies

customer_reviews.title: This smoker really works!
customer_reviews.text: I got this smoker as a gift for my father for his birthday, and as soon as well gave it to him we tested out some cherry wood smoke on a fontina cheese. We left it in the container with the smoke for about 15 minutes, and did a side by side taste test for before and after, and the difference was like night and day. It's really amazing how well this little smoker works. I highly reccomend it for a gift, or for yourself. It also arrived exactly on time less than 24 hours after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds some flare to your food!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used for a Sake dinner where we did smoked tofu! Now experimenting with other dishes and beverages. The only thing I would like to see is different house attachments that may be longer and have a more narrow end attachment so I dont lose as much smoke when trying to encase. Not a big deal since I can pick some things up from home depot to modify.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gadet! Perfect for smoking cocktails
customer_reviews.text: This gramercy portable handheld smoker is amazing! I bought it for adding smoke to booze forward cocktails like Manhattans and old fashioned's. It's absolutely perfect for small/at home use as and if you're a bartender like me, working it into your beverage program to add smoked cocktails to your guests. Plus it's half the praise of the cheapest smoking gun and you still get the same overall consistent levels of smoke flavor. Love supporting smaller, self owned brands like this too!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great price. Top notch customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. I was hesitant from reading reviews about units not working after a couple times for no apparent reason. I as well found myself in that category, however like other reviews their customer support is top notch! I contacted the company and got a quick response. A quick proof of purchase and they sent out a new smoker free of charge. Hassle free. I would recommend this product/company and would order again with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. I really enjoyed this in the 3 times I used it, but it quit working 32 days after purchase. I contacted the company and they were quick to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Minimal and professional tool that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Out of all the of the smoking devices I've used I like this one the best. It looks clean and professional so I know it will make a good impression with guests that come over for weekend events. I also love the bag it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Washington Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t give this as a gift because it only lasts a short time. After a month the fan breaks and no replacement fan available.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Riley

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: It died out within 2 months we try to clean the black soot buildup to stretch the lifespan but never works, does the Job really well but not for too lont
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: We've only used it once, but so far love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband's birthday. He's only used it for one day, but he loved it. It gave everything a great smokey flavor and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very giftable! My husband had expressed an interest in smoking bourbon to make a drink that he likes. He has had fun experimenting with this smoker and has found some videos on YouTube that were helpful. This smoker was very affordable and was easy to use. Now to try smoking cheese!
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Days

customer_reviews.title: Smokey Old Fashioned.....
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. Surprisingly easy to use. Worked well. Nice gift for the adventurous cocktail maker.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwurm

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the portable smoker last month. It worked great for 2 days then stopped working. I contacted Gramercy online support and e-mailed what had happened. They got back to me immediately and sent a new one out the next day! It has worked fabulous since! We use it for drinks and smoked some cheeses! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A., Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Smoked Old Fashions
customer_reviews.text: Made smoked old fashions. Easy to use not so easy to clean but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Professional results.
customer_reviews.text: It couldn't be easier and more fun to play with your food. And the results... in just a few minutes... are wonderful. I highly recommend it, even for foodies who may be tempted to buy the larger "professional" smoking gun. This totally does the job for under $30.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Merkin

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy using the smoker on drinks, cheeses, and meats. It takes a very small amount of chips. So do not overload.
customer_reviews.author: K. Arnett

customer_reviews.title: It's basically a glorified fan that works three times
customer_reviews.text: Let's see...It broke after three uses, pellets wouldn't light, and once they did, it was just basically a wood fan with a pipe on the end. I could have lit a fire in a cup and with better results.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best culinary tool I've bought in a while.
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome. I was pleasantly surprised at build quality and how well it works. You will not be disappointed if you are truly into smoking. Makes smoking indoors possible without all the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product needs better more detailed instructions included in the package
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Smoky cocktails are the best! I got this for my husband for Christmas after having a smoky old-fashion at a local restaurant. This cocktail smoker worked great, it was so easy to use and we were able to duplicate the cocktail! Our guests loved them as well. Looking forward to experimenting with more cocktails, meats and cheeses!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Jaster

customer_reviews.title: Gives great flavor to food.
customer_reviews.text: I like using this smoker for all kinds of meat. Just a little bit of extra work goes a long way into making a delicious meal.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Broken before it’s third use
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this smoker at first, but we just brought it out again to use for some smoked cocktails and it won’t turn on at all. This would have been only it’s third use. We changed the batteries, nothing is corroded- it just stopped working. Super bummer about the waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to use and definitely a conversation piece! Got it for fathers day for my Dad, he's 61. He loves this thing! You can definitely taste the smoke flavor and it adds a new dimension to your whiskey cocktails.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie bales

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to smoke glasses for cocktails. Worked great the first few times. But it stopped working about 3 months after buying it, just after return window closed. Motor runs, but won’t draw air to light the wood chips. Highly recommend looking elsewhere for a smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Pessanha

customer_reviews.title: Product quit working after two months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product but Product quit working after two months
customer_reviews.author: TRISH T

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Great for smoking cocktails. Customer Service was fantastic! Thank you Gramercy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and with good results!
customer_reviews.text: We used this to make smoked old fashioneds. First we smoked the Bourbon Cherries. Delious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for vaping😃
customer_reviews.text: Great product, feels sturdy, and well built. Wife thought it was a vap thing, when I showed her how it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Liked mine so much I bought my brother one as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Tiny but so useful when you want to add a little smoke rather than during up the whole smoker box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my husband. He LOVES it! We've only used it to make smoked Old Fashioneds so far but it easily could be used for foods. Definitely will be smoking charcuterie boards in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Simple, Good Design
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for smoke lovers Easy simple system to add smoked flavor to drinks, dishes, meats, cheeses etc.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Dad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father and he loved it. We use it for smoked cocktails mainly over there. Easy to figure out and such a fun thing to use for parties!
customer_reviews.author: TriciaBuns

customer_reviews.title: Smokey baby
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, works great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: adam p nalow

customer_reviews.title: Nice and useful product
customer_reviews.text: Love this for an impressive "trick" to wow my guests, or even just to play around with on my own. Nice and useful product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Father’s Day gift. My husband loved it. We’ve used it a few times and it always works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good starter
customer_reviews.text: Gets clogged up easily. However it does make food taste great when it is working.
customer_reviews.author: dela

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: It’s says it brings chips but it’s only a little bit. It’s best to buy the wood chips elsewhere. This isn’t a deal. Way to expensive over nothing. Save yourself the money and buy it cheaper without the chips.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smoker, with even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent smoker, with even better customer service! Alex really knows how to do business - my smoker was not functioning and Alex sent me a new one right away before a big party. My Smokey Old Fashions were a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: AS802

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy to use, good flavour to meat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you wish to have some additional flavour to your cheese, meat etc. Product is easy to use and the quality is fine. Cant compete with Breville smoke gun but does the job done for its price.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Fun way to entertain and improve presentation at a dinner party
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and great price
customer_reviews.text: Being a professional chef I have gone through a couple different smoke guns and this one has worked as good if not better than other ones. Super easy to use plus small and compact for my knife bag. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Tim kotula

customer_reviews.title: Was good for a while
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product when I first got it. I used it 1, sometimes 2 times a month for a few months and the fan quit rendering it useless. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it. simple to use... careful with fire to not melt the inside.. very powerful and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Teir

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this smoker and company! They’re a small family business and truly care about their customers. It’s small, portable, and easy to use. Can’t stop smoking :) Couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Demichael

customer_reviews.title: smoker
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother so have no idea how it is.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Brigham

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Burns the chips really easy and doed the work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for smoking cocktails. Would be better if there was a little cap to secure the wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's so quiet and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's so quiet and easy to use. If you ever wanted to treat yourself, this is it! The only problem is I didn't order two.
customer_reviews.author: David Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely fantastic! Easy to use and does the job! My husband is an Old Fashion fanatic, and he used this to smoke his cocktail and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Z.

customer_reviews.title: I love how simple it was to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how simple it was to use. It did a great job. So far I tried it on a whisky cocktail which added an interesting dimension to the taste and on chicken, just before grilling. I'm definitely going to give these as gifts! Great instruction booklet too
customer_reviews.author: Z Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend, he absolutely loves it! Super easy to use, portable, simple to clean. Our favorite so far is smoking beers and cocktails, I highly recommend this product👍
customer_reviews.author: sarah elizabeth janke

customer_reviews.title: Cool Smoker!
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is pretty cool. I bought it to make s’mores ice cream. I smoked the ice cream base to give it a campfire taste. Would I recommend this smoker. Absolutely I would.
customer_reviews.author: Bajjali

customer_reviews.title: and a very good product too smoke anything you need smoked
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping,and a very good product too smoke anything you need smoked.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy48

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift, absolutely love it could not be simpler. Thank you so much for making an easy to use smoker.
customer_reviews.author: SO14

customer_reviews.title: Smoke infuser
customer_reviews.text: Puts the right amount of smoke in food. Would recommend both the smoker and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Eberhardt

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Tried this smoker for the first time on short ribs cooked in oven. A little hickory smoke and they tasted as if cooked on grill
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Rajski

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic  gift
customer_reviews.text: If was my son in laws Christmas present. He has been smoking up a storm. Cheeses, bourbon. You name it he smokes it
customer_reviews.author: felicia redinger

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying....
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this if you want to add some smoke to your bourbon, Manhattan’s or Old-Fashiond.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: How to put the batteries. I want a full refund.
customer_reviews.text: Wrong instructions. The device overheated when off and now when placing the batteries well it doesnt turn on the resistance. UPDATE: see my next comment. Thank you people.
customer_reviews.author: Nahuel G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Portable Smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Definitely the best portable smoker I have ever owned. The storage bag is very nice and helps keep everything that you need in one place. Recipe guide is also very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Warnell

customer_reviews.title: It works just as it says it will. Just ...
customer_reviews.text: It works just as it says it will. Just follow how to use & do not run to long. Co-owner Alex sent me E-mail to let me know how to use & some more tips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Honestly and simply put: this is an amazing product. It is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tochan (父ちゃん)

customer_reviews.title: Love these guys
customer_reviews.text: I love this company great products and working at a 4 star 4 diamond hotel their products are always by my side.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J

customer_reviews.title: ♥♥♥♥
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! it came super fast and it is easy to use. A must have for any cocktail bartender!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Have used it so many times! Gives a great smoke flavor to food and drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Santana

customer_reviews.title: Lots of smoke & really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little gadget, makes lots and lots of smoke using just a little bit of wood, spice or tea.
customer_reviews.author: James Henry

customer_reviews.title: Periodically ceases to work
customer_reviews.text: Dislike that it gets gunked up and hard to clean, causes it to quit working
customer_reviews.author: Meldog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for craft cocktails
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and brings a unique element to both cocktails and cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Let your smoking imagination go!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted to try cold smoking. This makes it easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marcus

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: works great, exactly as described, fabulous customer service, & lightning fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: slowbird

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful portable smoker
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so happy with this portable smoker. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: jody wenthe

customer_reviews.title: Great little portable smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Adds a great amount of smoke to your desired effect! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool. Used it to smoke old fashions and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. Used it to smoke old fashions and mahattans and a steak . Easy to use great product
customer_reviews.author: priley02

customer_reviews.title: need some type of container so the smoke stay inside
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just wish come one would come up with a better way to use it when smoking the food a better container.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: love it still experimenting but that's what cooking is all about
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Smoke!! I use it to infuse my steaks before gas grilling!
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it it does its job for a good price good investment
customer_reviews.author: Tony brown

customer_reviews.title: You got what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one stopped working after a couple of days, nothing would happen when you turn it on-off. The sellers kindly sent us a 2nd one Again, died just after a 4 or 5 uses, this time it makes a weird rattle sounds and no smoke will come out. SO SAD!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: Dies easily
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one that has broken (stopped working) just beyond a month of purchase date. I'm very disappointed, as it was great for the (very) short lifespan... I might have gotten 5 uses out of it. For a quick gimmick, this might be worth it, but if you are actually wanting to put in some time smoking different things, don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Fractals

customer_reviews.title: Zero quality control!
customer_reviews.text: I would give less than one star if possible. I just received this unit and once I put batteries in it it fired right up...and would not stop no matter what. Had to remove the batteries to turn off. Opened up the unit to discover the switch had a piece of solder stretching across all three pins. Will be returning and purchasing the brevile/polyscience I wanted to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Skye McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Update: after my initial review, the seller reached out and offered me a replacement or refund. I took a replacement and it works as it’s supposed to. Horrible product. Used twice and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

product_meta.title: Cocktail Smoker - INCLUDES WOOD CHIPS - Smoking Gun | Smoke Meat, Drink & Food Indoor Infuser | Ultimate Sous Vide Foodie Accessories Gift
feature_bullets: NOW INCLUDES WOOD CHIPS - with other handheld smokers, you’ll have to purchase wood chips separately. But we’ve specially built our bundle to include all the accessories you’ll need to smoke your favorite cocktail, charcuterie, or cheeseboard. The GKC portable smoker offers a CLEANING BRUSH, WOOD CHIPS, and replacement parts EXCLUSIVE TO OUR PRODUCT. All with a black velvet STORAGE BAG to keep all your accessories together.

ELEGANTLY SIMPLE: Our handheld smoke infuser is engineered to the perfect size for smoking your meals and drinks with cool INDOOR smoke, transforming your gourmet kitchen skills. Too cold outside to smoke your rack of ribs? Not enough time to smoke a delicious week-night meal? Our portable, handheld smoker fixes that in a couple minutes. If you love sous vide accessories, it will also preserve the perfect edge-to-edge cooking of meats and adding smoky aroma. NOTE: wood chips not included.

BONUSES! You'll receive a downloadable recipe guide filled with tips & recipes for smoking the best craft cocktail or scotch, sous vide meats, and appetizer spreads. Also, we are building a growing library of some of the best at-home gourmet recipes around. You'll get free online access - make sure to watch your inbox!

CUSTOMER CARE PROMISE: GKC strives to create complete customer satisfaction, period. Reach out to us anytime, for any reason so we can help solve any problems that arise - our customers are more important than sales. And if we can’t we will replace or refund your order - zero questions asked. We also love to help out by recommending recipes, answering questions and being a resource as you use our products to make the best imaginable food. Please don’t hesitate to reach out - we love to help!

WHY WE DO WHAT WE DO: At GKC, we love to cook. We use our products daily and we only use the best. We provide the exact same for our customers. We offer the most convenient devices to add the finest culinary touches to your prepared meals and drinks. PROFESSIONAL QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - our GKC Portable Infusion Smoker is made of sturdy and easy to clean aluminum & rugged professional-grade plastic. Specially designed chamber for just the right amount of wood chips for smoking.
